root.name: Star Wars Episode I
root.description: OverviewStar Wars Episode I is a pinball machine based on the movie of the same name. Star Wars Episode 1 was developed and manufactured by Williams in 1999. Episode I was created using the Pinball 2000 platform, and was the second of only two machines to do so. Episode I was the last pinball machine created by Williams before they stopped making pinball machines.Star Wars Episode I was also available to purchase as a conversion kit to convert existing Revenge From Mars to Episode I.
